title: crackshot教程【附模板和一些配置】
txt_content:
本帖最后由 1245502180 于 2017-2-18 21:12 编辑 

我开服开了有一年了，一直用的crackshot这款插件，这款插件有很多优点，只是编辑起来复杂，要求严格最重要还要使用N++，于是想发此帖来告诉大家，还有一点是原来的一个教程贴
http://www.mcbbs.net/forum.php?mod=viewthread&tid=533907，很久没有更新，所以我想来更新下。
接下来我就要发送一些配置【小白福利】，这些配置原来是从别人手里购买，加自己加工，现在放出来




                              喷水管



                                       低级
psg:
    Item_Information:
        Item_Name: "&f喷水管&a低级&3"
        Item_Type: 290
        Item_Lore: "&a畜备水量&f>>&b10|&a范围伤害&f>>&b10|&a|&7“给你的敌人来个淋雨的感受吧”&b子弹: &f无限"
        Sounds_Acquired: BAT_TAKEOFF-1-1-0
    Shooting:
        Right_Click_To_Shoot: true
        Cancel_Left_Click_Block_Damage: true
        Cancel_Right_Click_Interactions: true
        Delay_Between_Shots: 4
        Recoil_Amount: 0
        Projectile_Amount: 1
        Projectile_Type: energy
        Projectile_Speed: 10
        Projectile_Subtype: 2-2-1-2
        Projectile_Damage: 10
        Bullet_Spread: 2
        Sounds_Shoot: WATER-1-2-5
    Burstfire:
        Enable: true
        Shots_Per_Burst: 3
        Delay_Between_Shots_In_Burst: 2
    Reload:
        Enable: true
        Reload_Amount: 10
        Reload_Duration: 10
        Sounds_Reloading: DRINK-1-2-6,SPLASH-1-1-0,SWIM-1-0-0,WATER-1-2-0
    Firearm_Action:
        Type: slide
        Close_Duration: 10
        Sound_Close: PISTON_RETRACT-1-2-0,PISTON_RETRACT-1-2-2
    Abilities:
        Reset_Hit_Cooldown: true
    Hit_Events:
        Enable: true
        Sounds_Shooter: SHOOT_ARROW-1-2-0
    Particles:
        Enable: true
        Particle_Player_Shoot: block_break-8


                                                               高级
psggj:
    Item_Information:
        Item_Name: "&f喷水管【高级】&3"
        Item_Type: 294
        Item_Lore: "&a剩余水量&f>>&b30|&a范围伤害&f>>&b60|&7“用你的水龙头狠狠地喷他们”|&b子弹: &f无限"
        Sounds_Acquired: BAT_TAKEOFF-1-1-0
    Shooting:
        Right_Click_To_Shoot: true
        Cancel_Left_Click_Block_Damage: true
        Cancel_Right_Click_Interactions: true
        Delay_Between_Shots: 4
        Recoil_Amount: 0
        Projectile_Amount: 1
        Projectile_Type: energy
        Projectile_Speed: 10
        Projectile_Subtype: 4-4-3-4
        Projectile_Damage: 60
        Bullet_Spread: 2
        Sounds_Shoot: WATER-1-2-5
    Burstfire:
        Enable: true
        Shots_Per_Burst: 3
        Delay_Between_Shots_In_Burst: 2
    Reload:
        Enable: true
        Reload_Amount: 30
        Reload_Duration: 10
        Sounds_Reloading: DRINK-1-2-6,SPLASH-1-1-0,SWIM-1-0-0,WATER-1-2-0
    Firearm_Action:
        Type: slide
        Close_Duration: 10
        Sound_Close: PISTON_RETRACT-1-2-0,PISTON_RETRACT-1-2-2
    Abilities:
        Reset_Hit_Cooldown: true
    Hit_Events:
        Enable: true
        Sounds_Shooter: SHOOT_ARROW-1-2-0
    Particles:
        Enable: true
        Particle_Player_Shoot: block_break-8,flames-1


                                          铲子手枪



cz:
    Item_Information:
        Item_Name: "&f铲子手枪&7[低级]&f"
        Item_Type: 269
        Item_Lore: "&a子弹伤害&f>>&b5|&a子弹弹夹&f>>&b4|&a|&7“铲子手枪最厉害”|&6|&b子弹: &f无限"
        Sounds_Acquired: BAT_TAKEOFF-1-1-0
    Shooting:
        Cancel_Left_Click_Block_Damage: true
        Cancel_Right_Click_Interactions: true
        Delay_Between_Shots: 10
        Recoil_Amount: 1
        Projectile_Amount: 1
        Projectile_Type: snowball
        Projectile_Speed: 40
        Projectile_Damage: 6
        Bullet_Spread: 2
        Sounds_Shoot: ITEM_BREAK-1-2-2,NOTE_SNARE_DRUM-1-0-2
    Sneak:
        Enable: true
        No_Recoil: true
        Bullet_Spread: 1
    Burstfire:
        Enable: true
        Shots_Per_Burst: 1
        Delay_Between_Shots_In_Burst: 2
    Reload:
        Enable: true
        Reload_Amount: 4
        Reload_Duration: 20
        Sounds_Reloading: FIRE_IGNITE-1-1-4,DOOR_OPEN-1-2-6,FIRE_IGNITE-1-1-36,HURT_FLESH-1-0-37,DOOR_CLOSE-1-2-38
    Firearm_Action:
        Type: slide
        Close_Duration: 10
        Sound_Close: PISTON_RETRACT-1-2-0,PISTON_RETRACT-1-2-2
    Scope:
        Enable: true
        Zoom_Amount: 5
        Zoom_Bullet_Spread: 1
        Sounds_Toggle_Zoom: ENDERDRAGON_WINGS-1-2-0
    Abilities:
        Reset_Hit_Cooldown: true
    Hit_Events:
        Enable: true
        Sounds_Shooter: SHOOT_ARROW-1-2-0

新人发帖不会排版，剩下的在下面发
把你们免费的人气给我吧，楼楼想升6级

replies.txt_content:
本帖最后由 1245502180 于 2017-2-17 17:12 编辑 

LFSD:
    Item_Information:
        Item_Name: "&E&L连发高速枪"
        Item_Type: 419
        Item_Lore: "&E&L连发高速枪的威力很大|&E&L一次发出很多子弹|&E&L子弹与枪械的完美结合"
    Shooting:
        Right_Click_To_Shoot: true
        Cancel_Left_Click_Block_Damage: true
        Cancel_Right_Click_Interactions: true
        Delay_Between_Shots: 60
        Recoil_Amount: 1
        Projectile_Amount: 50
        Projectile_Type: snowball
        Projectile_Speed: 35
        Projectile_Damage: 15
        Bullet_Spread: 2
        Sounds_Shoot: ENDERDRAGON_GROWL-1-1-1,IRONGOLEM_THROW-1-1-1,ITEM_PICKUP-1-1-1,SHEEP_SHEAR-1-1-1
    Reload:
        Enable: true  
        Reload_Amount: 10
        Reload_Duration: 60
        Sounds_Out_Of_Ammo: ITEM_BREAK-1-1-0
        Sounds_Reloading: FIRE_IGNITE-1-1-4,DOOR_OPEN-1-2-6,FIRE_IGNITE-1-1-36,HURT_FLESH-1-0-37,DOOR_CLOSE-1-2-38,ENDERDRAGON_WINGS-1-2-50
    Firearm_Action:
        Type: slide
        Close_Duration: 10
        Close_Shoot_Delay: 12
        Sound_Close: PISTON_RETRACT-1-2-0,PISTON_RETRACT-1-2-3
    Burstfire:
        Enable: true
        Shots_Per_Burst: 5
        Delay_Between_Shots_In_Burst: 10
    Abilities:
        Death_No_Drop: true
        Reset_Hit_Cooldown: true
        No_Vertical_Recoil: true
还有一些等会再发，我是从一个人哪里收来的，免费放出来
顶一下，求回复

flj:
    Item_Information:
        Item_Name: "&f蓄能发动机&e[Time_river]&7"
        Item_Type: 271
        Item_Lore: "&b畜备电量&f>>&a25|&b范围伤害&f>>&a200|&a|&7“我轰死你吧！”|&b子弹: &f无限|&e-===&c发动机&e===-"
        Sounds_Acquired: BAT_TAKEOFF-1-1-0

replies.author: w1403676227
replies.txt_content: 可以的，

MKQ:
    Item_Information:
        Item_Name: "&6&l[特殊]&a&lMG08机枪&R"
        Item_Type: 382
        Item_Lore: "&a=========================|&a基础介绍：|&a武器类型＞枪械＞特殊|  &6攻击伤害：&c12    &6射速：&c高|    &6品质：&6&l特殊|&a=========================|&6介绍：&6&l特殊超级机枪|&6&l神奇的射速 飞快的装弹|&6&l让对方屁滚尿流！！！"
    Shooting:
        Right_Click_To_Shoot: true
        Cancel_Left_Click_Block_Damage: true
        Cancel_Right_Click_Interactions: true
        Delay_Between_Shots: 3
        Recoil_Amount: 1
        Projectile_Amount: 1
        Projectile_Type: splash
        Projectile_Speed: 50
        Projectile_Damage: 12
        Bullet_Spread: 0.5
        Projectile_Flames: true
        Sounds_Shoot: FALL_BIG-2-2-0,ENDERDRAGON_WINGS-1-2-0
    Reload:
        Enable: true  
        Reload_Amount: 200
        Reload_Duration: 100
        Sounds_Out_Of_Ammo: ITEM_BREAK-1-1-0
        Sounds_Reloading: ENDERDRAGON_WINGS-1-2-0
    Abilities:
        Reset_Hit_Cooldown: true
    Hit_Events:
        Enable: true
        Message_Shooter: "&c&l对<victim>造成<damage>伤害！ ！ ！"
        Message_Victim: "&4你被<shooter>击中!"
    Headshot:
        Enable: true
        Bonus_Damage: 5
    Burstfire:
        Enable: true
        Shots_Per_Burst: 2
        Delay_Between_Shots_In_Burst: 2
    Potion_Effects:
        Activation: shoot
        Potion_Effect_Shooter: 
        Potion_Effect_Victim: 
    Particles:
        Enable: true
        Particle_Player_Shoot: flames
        Particle_Impact_Anything: flames-1
        Particle_Hit: block_break-99

电圈炮I:
